items.title: Cell-Auto — Cellular Automata
items.blurb: Interactive cellular automata playground — Conway's Game of Life and variants.
items.description: Visual experiment in emergent complexity from simple rules.

items.title: ESP32 CYD Hardware Tester
items.blurb: Diagnostic tool for testing random AliExpress ESP32 CYD boards.
items.description: Handy if you're buying cheap CYD devboards and need to confirm what you actually got.

_guide: Each item should include: id, title, blurb, description, url. Thumbnail is optional.
